Folksr.de - distributed votings using Microformats

Folksr is an application for distributed votings using Microformats and OpenID. It's not only cool, it's also highly experimental.

With folksr, I am looking for your help. :)

I'd highly appreciate your feedback, suggestions, support ... and of course ... participation!

Head over to these sites to learn more about folksr. And don't forget to create a voting and/or leave your votes :)

  • folksr.de
  • What is folksr?
  • How folksr works
  • FAQ: some questions about folksr
  • Announcement blog post: Folksr is here - again!

Other resources:

  • Microformats wiki page about vote-links
  • Some resources about OpenID
  • Folksr has been mentioned in "HTML Mastery" by Paul Haine, apperently

Further reading:

  • Initial blog post about the idea (June 2006)
  • First lessons learned: feedback about folksr (June 2006)
  • folksr.de - more thoughts on distributed votings (June 2006)
